posts.name: Fedor Indutny
posts.cooked:
Hello everyone! The Signal team is releasing a new version of Signal Desktop, v7.73.0-beta.1. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta here.

Release notes:

  • This update introduces new performance optimizations to help improve battery life, so you’ll have more charge available for emotionally charged conversations.

Commit changes: Comparing v7.72.0-beta.1…v7.73.0-beta.1 · signalapp/Signal-Desktop · GitHub

New Version: 7.73.0-beta.1

43 new commits since 7.72.0-beta.1:

Show commits

  • v7.73.0-alpha.1 [1]

  • Fix lint [2]

  • Advertise new link and sync capability [3]

  • Update local backups visibility [4]

  • Remove unused CDSI remote config keys [5]

  • Fix MediaGridItem for undownloaded GIFs [6]

  • Bump electron from 38.0.0 to 38.1.0 [7]

  • Show video duration in all media UI [8]

  • Update to libsignal v0.80.3, add future sealed sender trust roots [9]

  • Update badge information correctly when updating user profile [10]

  • Immediately handle audio device changes [11]

  • Fix emoji stories and add inline emoji story [12]

  • Enforce node: schema for builtins, import extensions [13]

  • Bump to libsignal v0.81.0 [14]

  • [signalapp/Signal-Desktop#7453] Update conversation list styles when dragging [15]

  • Update electron to 38.1.2 [16]

  • Update clean-transpile command to remove eslint cache [17]

  • Avoid foreign key error if message is deleted before saving attachments [18]

  • Improve handling of invalid incrementalMac during backup import [19]

  • Release notes for 7.72 [20]

  • Update strings [21]

  • Update DNS fallback [22]

  • Initial Poll message receive support [23]

  • Update to ringrtc v2.58.1 [24]

  • Allow empty inviteeAci field when importing GroupInvitationDeclinedUpdate update messages [25]

  • Qualify CJS-only module imports [26]

  • Fix attachment ciphertext size calculations for backup tier downloads [27]

  • Upgrade libsignal to v0.81.1, enable websocket compression via remote config [28]

  • Update handling of aborted attachment download jobs [29]

  • Fix suggested names for saved attachments [30]

  • Improve delivery receipt processing [31]

  • Update icon in MediaPermissionsModal [32]

  • Final fixes for storybook after ESM prep [33]

  • Limit unnecessary thumbnail generation [34]

  • Fail mock test runs if tests fail [35]

  • readSync mock test: look for visibility of last item [36]

  • Fix attachment backfill mock tests [37]

  • Show ready-to-download documents in media gallery [38]

  • Fix attachment backfill mock tests [39]

  • Fix lightbox mock tests [40]

  • Release notes for 7.73 [41]

  • Update strings [42]

  • 7.73.0-beta.1 [43]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-Desktop v7.72.0-beta.1…v7.73.0-beta.1

Localization changes

Note: after clicking a link, it may take a few seconds before GitHub jumps to the file (try scrolling a bit if it doesn’t).

posts.name: AlertSubject
posts.cooked:
Is this a bug or a leftover from when image previews from links where still considered to be attachments and listed as such?

grafik887×335 15.3 KB

This area says “media, links, files”

Media and files have a tab each, links dont. Plus the image previews arent in the media section either anymore

Leftover outdated wording or bug?
